description:
nova/compute/instance_types.py is supposed to raise an exception in response to certain error conditions, but we have no tests to verify that this actually works.

https://jenkins.openstack.org/job/nova-coverage/1080/cobertura/nova_compute/instance_types_py/
title: nova/compute/instance_types.py lacks unit tests for error conditions

comments.content:
nova/compute/instance_types.py is supposed to raise an exception in response to certain error conditions, but we have no tests to verify that this actually works.
